articles.author: Sumanti Sen
articles.title: Indian-American bizman Vinod Khosla blasts Trump after hosting Biden: ‘Do you want your kids to be like him?’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Indian-American billionaire Vinod Khosla has taken to X to make a comment in favour of Joe Biden while blasting Donald Trump
articles.content: Indian-American billionaire Vinod Khosla has taken to X to make a comment in favour of Joe Biden while blasting Donald Trump. In a post, Khosla asked if supporters of Trump would want their children … [+1845 chars]
